name: The Loop Planet
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam.

Some guy crash lands on a weird planet...it's like a loop or something!
Help the weird guy survive and explore a strange planet with a diverse environment, and some mysterious edifices...

Dev note: Ok, this is my first Ludum Dare Jam and it was a disaster, frankly, I think I picked the wrong idea right from the get-go and screwed myself over. This game idea is very UI-heavy and "content-dependent", and I have zero prepacked code, so all the code is written from scratch and very rushed.

Due to Compo rules, all assets must be made by me alone, so no stock-free music! ...I have no idea how to make music, so I made a very stanky low droning music with no time at all, lol. The art is also...uhh.

But after programming so intensively the past 2 days, I think I gained a little more confidence in Object-Oriented principles, so there's that.

Dev time: less than 24 hours (exact timing not yet calculated)
